meaning_str.bing:
adv. 基本上；大体上；〈口〉主要地
网络. 从根本上说；基本地；本质上

基本上；大体上；〈口〉主要地
从根本上说；基本地；本质上

基本上；从根本上说；大体上；总的说来；原则上；本质上

1.en: But a Chinese lawyer advised him in an e-mail that "any appeal is basically a waste of time. "
1.cn: 但一名中国律师在电邮中给她的建议是，“任何上诉基本都是浪费时间”。

2.en: Basically, however, Hitler was merely trying to save face when he spoke of "recapture of a part of the territories now lost in the West" .
2.cn: 说穿了，希特勒所谓“收复现在失去的西方部分地区”，只不过是想保全自己的面子而已。

3.en: Basically, the Corruptor seems to be a replacement for the Devourer.
3.cn: 基本上，堕落者看起来是用来取代前作的吞噬者的。

0.cn: 基本上这是“瑞秋碰过家具”大拍卖。

1.en: What's this one? "Bulk apperception"? Basically overall intelligence.
1.cn: 这个是什么？"整体统觉"？基本上就是总体智慧。

2.en: Basically, Rachel and I were in Vegas and we got drunk.
2.cn: 基本上，瑞秋和我在拉斯维加斯，我们喝醉了…

3.en: Oh, OK, OK, OK, well, basically, lately, I've, sort of had feelings for you.
3.cn: 基本上，最近我我对你有一些感觉。

4.en: Basically, there's the thing, and then there's the stuff after the thing.
4.cn: 基本上有这件事啦，然后又是那件事…

5.en: And now that gays are legal or whatever, it's basically everyone.
5.cn: 现在同性恋合法了，基本上所有人都牵着手。

6.en: Basically your body will go to sleep while your mind travels back in time.
6.cn: 基本上，你的身体会沉睡，期间你的意识穿越到过去。

7.en: You haven't been down here before, have you? Silence Of The Lambs, basically.
7.cn: 你从来没下来过吧？基本上就像《沉默的羔羊》那样。

8.en: Chinese menu guy. Forgot the menus. So, basically just a Chinese guy.
8.cn: 中餐馆的伙计，他忘了拿菜单了，所以基本上只是个中国人而已。

9.en: Basically, what I planned to do was to put a pond in over here, and have water streaming in from both sides.
9.cn: 基本上来说，我想在这造个水池，里面的水从两边流进来。

10.en: I mean I loved you in a you're-my-brother-so-l-have-to kind of way, but basically, yeah, I hated your guts.
10.cn: 我是说，我就像“你是我哥，所以我必须爱你”那样爱你，但基本上我恨死你了。

11.en: Anything new is bad, curiosity is bad. Going out at night is bad. Basically, anything fun is bad.
11.cn: 任何新鲜事物都是坏的，好奇心是坏的，夜晚外出是坏的。 基本上，任何有意思的都是坏的。

12.en: He's 12, basically you get him to and from school, and make sure he eats. That's it. Anything else you need, Esa will help you. Esa? Yes, ma'ma.
12.cn: 他12岁，基本上你只需要接送他上学放学，就这些，如果你需要什么，埃萨会帮你，埃萨？是的，夫人。

13.en: I basically just run past the guard gates, so I think I have 20 minutes until they find me. You don't have a break coming up, do you? I'm off in ten minutes.
13.cn: 我基本上是从安检门冲进来的。我觉得还要二十分钟，他们才能发现我。一会儿你就休息了，是吧。 我十分钟后下班。

14.en: She was incredible. And I would put on all these plays in my bedroom and it would basically just she and I reenacting the scenes from the movies. And then I wrote my own plays. Wow. Yeah.
14.cn: 她是真的很了不起。我会把所有的剧本放在我的卧室然后基本上就是我和她重现电影里的桥段。然后我写了一部自己剧本。是的。

15.en: Well, most of being a parent isn't fair. Right now, Alex is obsessed with some CEO business woman author who's basically an older-looking version of me. We're the same age, by the way.
15.cn: 为人父母大部分时候都没有公平可言。现在艾丽克斯迷上了一个什么CEO商业女强人作家，她基本上就是个看起来老一点版本的我。顺带一提我和她同龄。

17.cn: 反正，不是这里就是《机动世界》

18.en: And basically open the whole domain for me.
18.cn: 这些为我开创了一个新的领域。

19.en: And it's like basically making a very fiery broth.
19.cn: 其实像做一道特别辣的肉汤。
